Name: Zombie Blender
About the game: Zombie Blender is a retro indie 2D shooter where you kill zombies, explore the world, find new resources & items, and build bases. You will be challenged to survive hordes of zombies charging at you while you build up your base and attempt to get the latest weapons that will enable you in your survival. You will quickly find that killing zombies is a profitable business, but will you have a chance to also explore the map or will the zombies stop you dead in your tracks? Key features: crafitng and resource management system larger map with seed function more weapons more zombies interactive biomes
